main event: Observers reported a bright light that descended quickly from an altitude of about 3,000 feet, oscillated in the sky for about 5 minutes, and then disappeared moving erratically.
interesting points: The light was initially round and 4 or more times brighter than the brightest star., The object changed shape from round to cigar and turned bright red., The phenomenon was observed silently without any noise., Weather conditions during the observation were clear with 25 miles of visibility., The sighting lasted approximately 5 minutes before the object shot straight up and disappeared.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
location: Scott Air Force Base, Illinois, USA
witnesses: self-employed individual with previous Air Force experience
